title: Add or Remove Apps in Office 365 Waffle
steps: Click on Waffle (or Menu icon).
Click on More apps.
Click on All apps to see all Microsoft apps.
Scroll down to Admin Selected and click on an app (e.g., Escape 6).
Click on Pin (now it is pinned to the side bar).
To remove an app, right-click on it and select Unpin.

title: Share a File in OneDrive
steps: Open OneDrive.
Navigate to the file you want to share.
Right-click on the file and select Share.
Enter the recipient’s email or copy the link.
Click Send or Copy Link to finish.

title: Use Copilot to compose emails
steps: In a new message, click on Draft with Copilot
Type in an idea of your email, hit enter
If the first draft is not exactly what you want use the prompt pop-up to make changes - like, click on make it shorter
Still not the tone you're looking for...try, make it funnier
Once Copilot has drafted the email they want you prefer, click on Keep it
Be sure to review it and make any edits before sending it

title: Empty your Deleted Items and your Junk Email folder
steps: Click on the Junk email folder.
Click on Empty folder icon
Click on Delete All in pop-up
Click on the Deleted Items email folder
Click on Empty folder icon
Click on Delete All in pop-up

title: How to Ask for Support
steps: Sign in to Zendesk
Click on Submit A Request at the top
Choose to whom the ticket should go or Other/I don't know
Complete the rest of the form with as much information about the issue - the more the better
Click on Submit
You will get a confirmation on the screen as well as an email

title: Troubleshooting connection and power
steps: Question: The printer won't turn on or is not responding.
Answer: Ensure the printer is plugged in and the power cable is securely connected to both the printer and the power source. Check that the power button is pressed.
Question: The printer is connected but not printing.
Answer: Verify that the USB or network cable is securely plugged in on both the printer and the computer. Restart your computer and printer, then try printing again.
Question: I sent a document to print but it's stuck in the queue.

Answer: Restart the print spooler service on your computer. You can find this in the 'Services' menu, right-click 'Print Spooler,' and select 'Restart'. You can also clear the queue by canceling all pending print jobs.

title: Troubleshooting print quality
steps: Question: The print quality is poor, with missing lines or blurry text.

Answer:  Run the print head cleaning utility on your printer. If the problem persists, the print heads may need to be aligned. Your printer's maintenance or settings menu should have an option for this.
Question:  Colors are incorrect or washed out.
Answer: Check if the ink or toner cartridges are low or empty. Replace any that are empty and try printing again. You may also need to run a print head alignment or calibration.
Question: The text or images are skewed or crooked
Answer: Perform a print head alignment. This recalibrates the printer's internal components to ensure the lines print straight.

title: File and design questions
steps: Question: What is the correct color mode for professional printing?
Answer: Use the CMYK (Cyan, Magenta, Yellow, Key/Black) color model for accurate color reproduction on a commercial printer. RGB (Red, Green, Blue) is for digital screens.
Question: How do I make sure my document has enough space for an image or text?

Answer: For professional printing, you need to include a 'bleed'. This is an extra 1/8 inch margin around your document to account for any slight variations in the printing and cutting process. This means your finished size should be expanded by 1/4 inch to be safe.
Question: How can I make my printed document larger?
Answer: You can change the paper size in your print settings if your printer supports it (e.g., from Letter to Legal or Tabloid).
Question: What is a good resolution for printing images?
Answer: A resolution of 300 PPI (pixels per inch) is recommended for small print projects like cards and brochures, while 150 PPI is sufficient for larger formats like posters and banners.

title: Resetting Your ADSS Password
steps: You can change your password by clicking on the 'Password Reset/Unlock Account' link displayed on the login screen
Or by opening the ADSS portal
